entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 10:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 6.5°C
Wind: WSW 27 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then light near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
